long_description: A compact, lightweight pack with plenty of room for weekend backpacking trips, the Mountainsmith Eclipse pack uses an adjustable harness with a soft memory foam hipbelt for excellent comfort. Independently adjustable shoulder straps, an air mesh backpanel and a pivoting waistbelt with dual-density memory foam comfortably disperse the load. Compression straps with quick release hardware offer a place to store your sleeping pad. Adjustable top lid features a top compression strap for climbing rope attachment. Webbing keepers, tool attachment points and dual ice axe loops offer plenty of places to stash extras. Collared storm shield with drawcord closure; four compression straps with quick-release hardware; two water bottle pockets accommodate 32 oz. water bottles. Hydration compatible with single exit port; elastic sternum strap and bite valve catch. Special buy.
short_description: A compact, lightweight pack with plenty of room for weekend backpacking trips, the Mountainsmith Eclipse pack uses an adjustable harness with a soft memory foam hipbelt for excellent comfort.
